summary: In this coaching clip, a rugby coach emphasizes the importance of proper body positioning during drills. He instructs players to lower their hips effectively to improve their technique, particularly when executing high taps. The coach shares his personal experience of being criticized for similar mistakes, adding a relatable touch to his advice. He encourages players to focus on their form and drive through the circle after dropping their hips, reinforcing key fundamentals of the game.

participants: The coach and a group of rugby players.
